meanings: Pronoun (Abbr.) 거2. this, that (→저거, 그것, 이거)

examples.korean: ‘It isn’t fair!’, he exclaimed angrily. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그건 불공평해!” 그가 화가 나서 소리쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘It isn’t fair!’, he exclaimed angrily. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It seems like an act of monumental folly. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그건 엄청나게[어처구니없을 정도로] 어리석은 짓 같아 보인다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It seems like an act of monumental folly. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’s a nice table! The only problem is (that) it’s too big for our room. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그건 멋진 탁자예요! 유일한 문제점은 우리 방에 두기엔 너무 크다는 거죠. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s a nice table! The only problem is (that) it’s too big for our room. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was dirt cheap. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그건 정말 값이 쌌어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was dirt cheap. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You made that up! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그건 네가 지어낸 거야! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
